title: [KAIST SoC Colloquium]Engineer Life in Big Tech
content: title:[KAIST SoC Colloquium]Engineer Life in Big Tech date:2024-03-04T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=11037&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:Speaker : Jinwon Lee (Meta AI / Senior Staff Engineer) Time : 16:00, March 4, 2024 Location : Zoom ( Online ) Language : Korean Here is the talk's abstract and the speaker's short biography. Abstract In this talk, Jinwon will share his personal journey as an engineer in Big Tech like Meta and Amazon along with some lessons learned for career development. Bio Jinwon Lee is 14＋ years of experience ML/AI Tech Lead and Manager. He is currently working in Meta AI and also worked in Amazon and Qualcomm before. Delivered best-in-class ML/AI products for Meta FB/IG, Amazon Alexa/Ring and Qualcomm SoC. Top ranked in ML/AI competitions (#1 in CVPR'19 visual wake words, #3 in NeurIPS'19 micronet) and received best paper (IEEE MDM'06) and best demo (SECON'12) awards. Published 30＋ research papers on top conferences in various fields. If you want to get more information about the colloquium, please refer to colloquium page: https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/colloquium/ . location:Abstract tag:csweb.calendar
